snippet: Content packagers like Aha would allow drivers to carry their preset radio-station favorites and settings between vehicles, and spare automakers the hassle of curating in-car content.
abstract: Content packagers like Aha would allow drivers to carry their preset radio-station favorites and settings between vehicles, and spare automakers the hassle of curating in-car content.

headline.main: Faced With Endless Telematics Updates, Automakers Have Their Aha Moment
